name: I LEBRON CLE
description: Who doesn't love LeBron? Keep him in Cleveland! Finished in throwback Blue/Orage/White CAVS colors. 100% Fine Jersey cotton construction. The softest, smoothest, best-looking T-shirt available anywhere. Mens printed on American Apparel 2001 Please click "SIZE CHART" link to the right to check your size measurements. Click on images to view larger. Click on the numbers to view on body. If you're not sure what size to get or if you're in-between sizes, please order the next size larger. Please double check your size by clicking our "SIZE CHART" link to the right to check your size measurements. Double check your order to make sure you filled out everything correctly, and ordered the correct size and item. All shirts are 100% cotton. When washing, we recommend that you flip your shirt inside out, wash cold, and hang dry.
